mapper.select: SELECT lsn.stu_id, lsn.stu_name, lsn.subject_id, lsn.subject_name, doc.year_lsn_cnt, doc.pay_style, SUM(CASE WHEN lesson_type = 0 THEN lsn_count ELSE 0 END) AS total_lsn_cnt0, SUM(CASE WHEN lesson_type = 1 THEN lsn_count ELSE 0 END) AS total_lsn_cnt1, SUM(CASE WHEN lesson_type = 2 THEN lsn_count ELSE 0 END) AS total_lsn_cnt2 FROM v_info_lsn_statistics_by_stuid lsn INNER JOIN v_latest_subject_info_from_student_document doc ON lsn.stu_id = doc.stu_id AND lsn.subject_id = doc.subject_id WHERE 1=1 AND EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM t_mst_student mst WHERE mst.stu_id = lsn.stu_id AND mst.del_flg = 0 ) AND lsn.lsn_month BETWEEN #{year_month_from} AND #{year_month_to} GROUP BY lsn.stu_id, lsn.stu_name, lsn.subject_id, lsn.subject_name, doc.year_lsn_cnt, doc.pay_style ORDER BY lsn.stu_name, lsn.subject_id;
